Home » 14S5 Mahāvaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 4 Indriyasaṃyutta » 4.7 Bodhipakkhiyavagga
4.7.1 Saṃyojanasutta
Indriyasaṃyutta
Bodhipakkhiyavagga
Saṃyojanasutta
531.
1229Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, indriyāni bhāvitāni bahulīkatāni saṃyojanappahānāya saṃvattanti. Katamāni pañca? Saddhindriyaṃ…pe…  paññindriyaṃ—  imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni bahulīkatāni saṃyojanappahānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
1230Paṭhamaṃ.
